# CHC Therapy - Coping and Healing Counseling
# https://chctherapy.com

> Professional online therapy and mental health services in Georgia

## About
Coping and Healing Counseling (CHC) provides licensed online therapy services throughout Georgia. We specialize in evidence-based mental health treatment including individual therapy, couples counseling, teen therapy, and life coaching.

## Services
- Online Therapy (Telehealth)
- Individual Therapy
- Couples & Marriage Counseling
- Teen Therapy (Ages 13+)
- Life Coaching
- EMDR Therapy
- CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy)

## Conditions We Treat
- Anxiety Disorders
- Depression
- PTSD & Trauma
- ADHD
- Bipolar Disorder
- OCD
- Grief & Loss
- Relationship Issues
- Social Anxiety
- Panic Disorder

## Insurance Accepted
- Amerigroup
- CareSource
- Peach State Health Plan
- Aetna
- Blue Cross Blue Shield
- Cigna
- Humana
- Optum
- Alliant Health

## Service Area
We serve all 159 counties in Georgia via telehealth, including:
- Atlanta Metro (Fulton, DeKalb, Cobb, Gwinnett)
- Savannah (Chatham County)
- Augusta (Richmond County)
- Macon (Bibb County)
- Columbus (Muscogee County)

## Contact
Phone: (404) 832-0102
Website: https://chctherapy.com
Appointments: https://chctherapy.com/therapist-matching
